attributes.action: Nigel Farage should be ennobled for services rendered to the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: Mr. Nigel Farage has worked steadfastly to secure the British people a vote on weather we are to remain or leave the European Union. He has been a lone voice for many years and his services in fighting 'The Establishment' should be recognised with a Hereditary title.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
